page.title: 18CHILDRENS ACTIVITIES
page.content: The{guides}go to the Methodist chunch Hall. On Monday, Tuesday and Thursday. It starts at 7.00pm and finshes at 8.00pm. The girls starts guides when they are 10 and go to rangers when they are 15. The guides unitform is Navy skirt, guides Blouse, different colours of scarfs, Brown woggle, Black, Brown or Blue shoes. Other activities they play include games like rounders and honey pot. Most time at guides is taken up by badges but cooking,barbeques and camps take place occasionally. BROWNIES Brownies are for girls between 7 years and 10 years of age.If you are a brownie after a month or to you get enrolled with a promise badge. In summer they do out door activities and in the winter they play games.
